page.title: 05LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: PEOPLE IN GOUROCK ARE INVOLVED IN VARIOUS LEISURE ACTIVITIES.TWO OF THE FAVOURITE WAYS OF RELAXING FOR GOUROCK PEOPLE ARE GARDENING AND WATCHING TELEVISION.IN A RECENT SURVEY A NUMBER OF PEOPLE STATED THAT THEY WATCHED TELEVISION FOR AS MUCH AS 6 HOURS PER DAY. ONE LEISURE ACTIVITY WHICH IS MUCH LESS COMMON TODAY THAN IN THE PAST IS GOING TO THE CINEMA.THERE ARE NOW NO CINEMAS STILL OPEN IN GOUROCK,AND VERY FEW PEOPLE TRAVEL TO THE CINEMA IN OTHER TOWNS. WHEN ASKED ABOUT THEIR LEISURE ACTIVITES A NUMBER OF LOCAL PEOPLE SAID THAT THEY WOULD LIKE TO BE INVOLVED IN MORE SPORTS,AND FELT THAT THE TOWN BADLY NEEDED A SPORTS CENTRE.
